Desc.eng: Oh, Van Helsing, you brought a dragon fang… I’ve never thought that you need…. you know! But I’ll prepare the potion as soon as I can.
I have no idea what you are talking about. It’s only a trophy from a mythical beast.
Oh, sweet! You really don’t have any idea, haven’t you? Good. Don’t ask why I need it. I give you a rare ring if you hand it to me.
